=== Activities ===

* MOTU since ~2006, <nowiki>[[MOTU-Council|MOTU Council member]]</nowiki>, mentor and developer of the <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-dev/ubuntu-dev-tools/trunk|ubuntu-dev-tools]]</nowiki> package.
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-mirror-admins|Ubuntu mirror administrator]]</nowiki>.
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~revu-admins|REVU administrator]]</nowiki>.
* Ubuntu <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-irc|IRC operator]]</nowiki> on Freenode.
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-backporters|Ubuntu backporter]]</nowiki>.
* Ticket triager at the <nowiki>[[https://rt.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu Request Tracker]]</nowiki>.
* Ubuntu LoCo <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-eu.org/?page_id=5|DNS master]]</nowiki>.
* Maintainer of the ubot2 and ubot4 IRC bots (See: UbuntuBots).

I also do other various things to help the community out.

=== Past activies ===

* Kubuntu Forums administrator.
* Kubuntu-es.org administrator.
* Former maintainer of the Spanish IRC bot.
* Administrator of an <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-uk.org|Ubuntu-UK]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://podcast.ubuntu-uk.org|podcast]]</nowiki> mirror and I wrote some documentation on how to <nowiki>[[UKTeam-PodcastMirroring|set up a new mirror for that]]</nowiki>.
